titleStmt.title: All in one, all useful sciences and profitable arts in one book of Jehovah Aelohim, copied out and commented upon in created beings, comprehended and discovered in the fulness and perfection of scr[i]pture-knowledges / by Francis Bampfield ...
titleStmt.author: Bampfield, Francis, 1615 or 16-1683.

titleStmt.title: All in one, all useful sciences and profitable arts in one book of Jehovah Aelohim, copied out and commented upon in created beings, comprehended and discovered in the fulness and perfection of scr[i]pture-knowledges / by Francis Bampfield ...
titleStmt.author: Bampfield, Francis, 1615 or 16-1683.

notesStmt.note: Partial title in Hebrew and Greek at head of each t.p.
Part 2 has separate t.p. with title: Septima dies, dies desiderabilis, Sabbatum Jehovae. The seventh-day-Sabbath, the desirable day, the closing completing day of that first created week.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
